EmailTemplate.name: 202009_Americas_GDT_User-Growth_Choose-GoDirect-Trade-and-make-things-easy-for-y
EmailTemplate.subject: Choose GoDirect Trade and make things easy for yourself
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Placing an order for that part you need shouldn’t be a long process.
Do you send out quote requests because it’s just part of your process? Do you email sellers because they never post prices? Do you use a telephone to place an order? 92% of consumers shop online.
Every time you need an aerospace part, check GoDirect Trade first. It takes a second to search and sixty seconds to check out.
Start your own digital transformation. Launch your e-commerce storefront within minutes and see why Forbes, The Wall Street Journal and Yahoo! Finance can’t stop talking about our marketplace.
#NoExcuses SEARCH NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Fist Bump,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirect Trade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> (powered by Honeywell)
